meanings.definition: A specialized structure in parasitic plants that penetrates the host tissue to obtain nutrients.
meanings.sent1: The haustoria of the parasitic plant reached deep into the host to get food.
meanings.sent2: The haustoria of the plant helped it absorb nutrients from the host.
meanings.sent3: The haustoria of the plant were like tiny straws sipping nutrients from the host.
meanings.sent4: The haustoria of the plant were like greedy fingers stealing nutrients from the host.
meanings.sent5: The haustoria of the plant were like tiny thieves stealing food from the host.
